00043         void CScriptManager::Init(int argc, wchar_t** wargv)
00044         {
00045                 if(argc && wargv)
00046                 {
00047         #ifdef PYTHON31
00048                         Py_SetProgramName(wargv[0]);
00049         #elif defined(PYTHON26)
00050                         char programName[255] = {0};
00051                         wcstombs(programName, wargv[0], 255);
00052                         Py_SetProgramName(programName);
00053         #endif
00054                 }
00055 
00056                 Py_Initialize();
00057 
00058                 if(argc && wargv)
00059                 {
00060         #ifdef PYTHON31
00061                         PySys_SetArgv(argc, wargv);
00062         #elif defined(PYTHON26)
00063                         // Will refactor later
00064                         std::vector<std::string> argsCollection;
00065                         std::vector<char*> argv;
00066                         char buffer[255] = {0};
00067                         for (int i = 0; i < argc; ++i)
00068                         {
00069                                 wcstombs(buffer, wargv[i], 255);
00070                                 argsCollection.push_back( buffer );
00071                                 argv.push_back( const_cast<char*>( argsCollection.back().c_str() ) );
00072                         }
00073                         PySys_SetArgv(argc, &argv[0]);
00074         #endif
00075 
00076                 }
00077 
00078                 mMainModule = PyImport_AddModule("__main__");
00079         }

00083         void CScriptManager::Shutdown()
00084         {
00085                 Py_Finalize();
00086 
00087                 TModuleMap::iterator it = mModules.begin();
00088                 while(it != mModules.end())
00089                 {
00090                         // Some bug in python, it tries to access
00091                         // modules after finalize
00092                         mUnloaded.push_back(it->second);
00093                         ++it;
00094                 }
00095 
00096                 mModules.clear();
00097         }
00098 
00100 
00101         CScriptManager::~CScriptManager()
00102         {
00103                 for(size_t i = 0; i != mUnloaded.size(); ++i)
00104                         delete mUnloaded[i];
00105         }

00109         void CScriptManager::ExportModule(const char* moduleName, const module::ModuleHandle& module)
00110         {
00111                 CScriptModule* scriptModule = FindOrCreateModule(moduleName);
00112                 module::ModuleHandle::iterator end = module.MapEnd();
00113                 for(module::ModuleHandle::iterator it = module.MapBegin();
00114                         it != end;
00115                         ++it)
00116                 {
00117                         if(type* t = it.ReflectedType())
00118                         {
00119                                 ASSERT_STRICT(t->arch_type() == ARCH_USERDEFINED);
00120                                 scriptModule->ExportType(static_cast<user_type*>(t));
00121                         }
00122                 }
00123 
00124                 scriptModule->SetModuleHandle(module);
00125         }

00129         void CScriptManager::ExportType(const char* moduleName, user_type *type)
00130         {
00131                 CScriptModule* module = FindOrCreateModule(moduleName);
00132                 module->ExportType(type);
00133         }

00136 
00137         CScriptModule* CScriptManager::FindOrCreateModule(const char* moduleName)
00138         {
00139                 TModuleMap::iterator it = mModules.find(moduleName);
00140                 if(it != mModules.end())
00141                         return it->second;
00142 
00143                 CScriptModule* module = new CScriptModule(moduleName);
00144                 bool unique = mModules.insert(std::make_pair(moduleName, module)).second;
00145                 ASSERT_STRICT(unique);
00146                 return module;
00147         }

00151         void CScriptManager::RunScript(const char *file)
00152         {
00153         #ifdef PYTHON31
00154                 PyObject* pyName = PyUnicode_FromString(file);
00155         #elif defined(PYTHON26)
00156                 PyObject* pyName = PyString_FromString(file);
00157         #endif
00158                 PyObject* pyScript = PyImport_Import(pyName);
00159                 Py_DECREF(pyName);
00160 
00161                 if(!pyScript)
00162                 {
00163                         PyErr_Print();
00164                         throw module::RuntimeException("Module loading failed");
00165                 }
00166 
00167                 PyModule_AddObject(mMainModule, file, pyScript);
00168                 //Py_DECREF(pyScript);
00169         }

00173         bool CScriptManager::FindEntry(const char* name, SScriptAny& outValue)
00174         {
00175                 outValue.clear();
00176 
00177                 if(!name)
00178                         return false;
00179 
00180                 PyObject* obj = FindScriptObject(name);
00181                 bool res = MakeAny(obj, outValue);
00182 
00183                 Py_XDECREF(obj);
00184                 return res;
00185         }

00189         bool CScriptManager::ExportVariable(const char* moduleName, const char* varName, const reflection::value_type_pair& value)
00190         {
00191                 PyObject* pyvalue = ConvertToObject(value);
00192 
00193                 CScriptModule* module = FindOrCreateModule(moduleName);
00194 
00195                 return module && pyvalue
00196                         ? module->ExportVariable(varName, pyvalue)
00197                         : false;
00198         }

00202         bool CScriptManager::CreateInstance(const char* typeName, SScriptAny& outInstance)
00203         {
00204                 if(!typeName)
00205                         return false;
00206 
00207                 // Find type object
00208                 PyObject* type = FindScriptObject(typeName);
00209                 if(!type || !PyType_Check(type))
00210                 {
00211                         Py_XDECREF(type);
00212                         return false;
00213                 }
00214 
00215                 // Create instance
00216                 PyObject* args = PyTuple_New(0);
00217                 PyObject* inst = PyObject_CallObject(type, args);
00218                 Py_DECREF(args);
00219                 Py_DECREF(type);
00220 
00221                 if(!inst)
00222                         return false;
00223 
00224                 bool ret = MakeAny(inst, outInstance);
00225                 Py_DECREF(inst);
00226 
00227                 return ret;
00228         }

00231 
00232         void CScriptManager::InvokeCallable(PyObject* callable, value_type_pair* args, size_t nargs, value_type_pair* ret)
00233         {
00234                 // Create arguments
00235                 PyObject* py_args = PyTuple_New(nargs);
00236 
00237                 for(size_t i = 0; i != nargs; ++i)
00238                 {
00239                         PyObject *arg = ConvertToObject(args[i]);
00240 
00242                         PyTuple_SET_ITEM(py_args, i, arg);
00243                 }
00244 
00245                 // Call
00246                 PyObject *py_ret = PyObject_CallObject(callable, py_args);
00247                 PyErr_Print();
00248 
00249                 // Handle return value
00250                 if(ret)
00251                         ConvertObject(py_ret, *ret);
00252 
00253                 Py_DECREF(py_ret);
00254                 Py_DECREF(py_args);
00255         }

00259         ExportEntry* CScriptManager::FindExportedType(const char* name, CScriptModule* moduleHint)
00260         {
00261                 ExportEntry* typeEntry = 0;
00262                 if(moduleHint)
00263                 {
00264                         typeEntry = moduleHint->FindExportedType(name);
00265                 }
00266                 else
00267                 {
00268                         TModuleMap::const_iterator it = mModules.begin();
00269                         while(it != mModules.end())
00270                         {
00271                                 if(it->second != moduleHint)
00272                                 {
00273                                         typeEntry = it->second->FindExportedType(name);
00274                                         if(typeEntry)
00275                                                 break;
00276                                 }
00277                         }
00278                 }
00279                 return typeEntry;
00280         }
00281 
00283 
00284         PyObject* CScriptManager::FindScriptObject(const char *name)
00285         {
00286                 char name_buf[100];
00287 
00288                 int first = 0;
00289                 int last = 0;
00290                 PyObject *obj = mMainModule;
00291                 Py_INCREF(obj);
00292 
00293                 while(true)
00294                 {
00295                         // Iterate to find position of "." or end of string
00296                         for(; name[last] != '.' && name[last] != '\0'; ++last);
00297 
00298                         assert(last - first < 100);
00299                         memcpy(name_buf, &name[first], last - first);
00300                         name_buf[last-first] = '\0';
00301 
00302                         PyObject *t = obj;
00303                         obj = PyObject_GetAttrString(t, name_buf);
00304                         Py_DECREF(t);
00305 
00306                         if(!obj || name[last] == '\0')
00307                                 break;
00308 
00309                         first = ++last;
00310                 }
00311 
00312                 return obj;
00313         }

00318         method_member* CScriptManager::ExtractMethodInfo(PyObject* methodSelf)
00319         {
00320                 ASSERT_STRICT(PyLong_Check(methodSelf));
00321                 return reinterpret_cast<method_member*>(PyLong_AsSsize_t(methodSelf));
00322         }

00333         ExportEntry* CScriptManager::ExtractTypeInfo(PyObject* type)
00334         {
00335                 ExportEntry* ret = (ExportEntry*)((char*)type - offsetof(ExportEntry, ClassObj));
00336                 return ret->_header == _EntHeader ? ret : 0;
00337         }

00341         ExportEntry* CScriptManager::FindExportedBase(PyTypeObject *type)
00342         {
00343                 ExportEntry* e = ExtractTypeInfo((PyObject*)type);
00344                 if(!e && type->tp_base)
00345                         e = FindExportedBase(type->tp_base);
00346 
00347                 return e;
00348         }

00352         void* CScriptManager::PrepareInstancePointer(InstanceObject* inst_info, const user_type* ownerType)
00353         {
00354                 size_t offset = user_type::calculate_offset(*inst_info->object_type->Type, *ownerType);
00355                 return adjustptr(inst_info->instance, offset);
00356         }
